violations.description: Ensure elements marked as presentational do not have global ARIA or tabindex so that all screen readers ignore them
violations.help: Elements marked as presentational should be consistently ignored

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Element does not have global ARIA attribute

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

nodes.html: <sds-button href="#main-content" class="fixed top-4 left-4 -translate-y-[200%] focus:translate-y-0 z-[9999] transition-transform" id="skip-link" size="lg" type="button" value="" variant="primary">Hopp til hovedinnhold</sds-button>
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks
